messages.content: Liberal Democrats are now the real opposition to the Tories on Europe. We are the only major party calling for the people – not a Tory Prime Minister, Tory cabinet ministers or a Tory majority in the Commons – to be given the final say on the Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are calling for the final say on the Brexit deal to be given to the people, not just the Conservative government.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn, Theresa May, Neil Coyle

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the real opposition to the Tories on Europe. As a proud European, Simon Hughes was devastated by the vote for the UK to leave the European Union.
issues.governance: We are the only major party calling for the people – not a Tory Prime Minister, Tory cabinet ministers or a Tory majority in the Commons – to be given the final say on the Brexit deal.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was devastated by the vote for the UK to leave the European Union.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Bermondsey and Old Southwark
politicalExperience.achievements: Tens of thousands of local people helped with campaigns on housing, schools, and health.

images.caption: Simon Hughes - For Bermondsey and Old Southwark

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. This year we have a chance to bring back the sort of MP our area deserves and to vote for a party that will stand up for our area against the Tories.
